about_the_game:
Elemental Seasons is a brutal exploration and survival game set in a seasonal themed world. Explore each biome, defeat every boss to earn the chance to escape this world!

EXPLORE THE SEASONAL BIOMES

Immerse yourself in a breathtaking new world divided into four unique biomes inspired by the beauty of each seasons. Explore the valley of autumn, the thick woods of summer, the rebirth in spring and the death of winter. Each biome offers its own unique challenges, secrets, and stunning visuals.

DEFEAT ELEMENTAL TITANS

Prepare for epic battles against 4 elemental titans, each embodying the power of nature. Face the fury of Fire, the uncontrollable wrath of Water, the raging tempest of Air, and the crushing strength of Earth. Each fight is a test of skill and survival against the elements themselves.

BRUTAL YET FAIR COMBAT

Face challenging combat where enemies wield elemental strengths, but you can counter them by consuming specific foods or rely solely on your skill to parry every strike. Every enemy attack can be parried with precision, negating all damage. Be a parry master or stack the odds in your favor, the choice is yours.

KEY FEATURES:

  • The world consists of 4 biomes each with its unique enemies and resources.

  • Parry based combat where the player can afford to not eat anything and still win boss fights.

  • Rewarding food system that gives an edge to players who need it.

  • Epic boss fights that will satisfy the player's fantasies of being able to control different elements.

name: Elemental Seasons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9300H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650

short_description: An exploration and survival game where players must fight elemental-themed monsters in order to escape this beautiful yet brutal world.
